• If you are taking maternity leave, inform 
your employer in writing 15 weeks before 
the week your baby is due. You can claim 
for Statutory Maternity Pay (SMP).
• If you are entitled to Maternity Allowance, 
you can claim from when you are 26 
weeks pregnant.
• If your partner plans to take paternity 
leave, they will need to inform their 
employer.

• Your baby will be quite small.
• You	may	find	that	you	are	
getting more tired.
